body:
Heya everyone!

I'm pleased to announce that Play with Porky is finally starting up. I made a new Skype account for this, and I wanted to make this thread to assure all of you whom I sent a request to that it truly is me, and not a random person, since I did have questions about that.

If you'd like to be a part of this series, please add PlayWithPorky on Skype, and also leave a comment on this thread with your Skype name so that I know who you are.

I'll be posting all the videos on this thread (This thread is just for this series, since it will most likely be a bigger or main series on my channel)!

Anyways, please post your Skype name down below prior to adding me on Skype so that I know who you are :)
body_tagged:

Anyways, please post your Skype name down below prior to adding me on Skype so that I know who you are :)
title: Play with Porky Video Hub + Skype Names!
